description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(438).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,586,0,0,0,-1).
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[438], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[-(x^7 - 20 x^6 + 21 x^5 - 272 x^4 - 293 x^3 - 272 x^2 - 21 x - 20)/(x^8 - 586 x^4 + 1), {x, 0, 25}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 10 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
